What are your play style \"\"quirks\"\"?: I try as hard as possible to recreate the feel and nostalgia I have for The Sims 1 and TS2 so I try to recreate those lots and sims, especially the original Goths.  I then plan to play out their lives similar to how they unfolded through those two games. I also love recreating houses from video games I've played.
Any other comments?\r:
Most of my time with TS4 has been browsing, downloading, organizing, and testing CC so I have comparably little time spent in the game compared to many others even though I've had the game since 2015.  But I also stopped playing for many years because the time between interesting content was too long and the base game mechanics are just kinda boring.  I love the building tools and so I have sparks of inspiration that make me jump in and build something but I tend to engage rather little with the sims themselves despite my plans to do so.  But the fixed lots with generally small sizes tends to stymie some creativity and the the fact that updates tend to break mods is endlessly frustrating and keeps me away from devoting more time to the game."
